title: Art Deco sans typeface?
content:
Anyone know what font this is? It's not Kabel and I've tried What The Font but to no avail!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714152618/http:/typophile.com/files/1_0.jpg) | 35.96 KB |
author: geedee

comments.content:
no takers, so I'll give it a shot myself.  
looks like House Industries' Neutraface Display Medium Alternates.  
hope I got it right.

I was searching similar font while a ago and Neutraface was actually the closest one I found.  
It's pretty close to Neutraface Display Medium Alternate, E and S are quite different in Neutraface though.
check out the "R"'s where exactely how far Avernus is from this sample shows out clearly.
ooops... too much hurry. Very far from the sample indeed.

I have to agree with George. I can't seem to get my small caps to work for some reason, but I'd guess that this is set all small caps as well. The bottom juncture of the W is closed a bit more than the cap
